post.text: Not every wound can be seen. Our veterans deserve the best mental health services we can give. #NBCNewsForum

comment.author: Bryson
comment.text: After watching this great special I have no idea how ANYONE can support Trump. He is a broken record and all he did was tout Donald Trump. His grasp of the world's situation is that of a 3rd grader !!!

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: I said the same thing tonight. Are people seriously going to vote for him? That floors me to think that people watched that tonight and will still vote for him!

replies.author: Bryson
replies.text: Tyler , it's almost like we're in the twilight zone - I blame a lot of his success on the media NOT cutting him to shreds on a TON of things..

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Bryson I agree... I don't understand how he got this far. He is asked a question and instead of answering it he starts spouting off what Obama and Hillary have done wrong. I think Matt Lauer was getting pissed at him.
